channel.title: Nature on Gabriel Lopez

item.title: Pando: The Trembling Giant
item.description:
Was made aware of a tree a few days ago by a friend. It is called Pando. It is apparently the world’s largest tree.

Here is a picture of it here:

It a tree that is located in Utah in the Fishlake National Forest and wasn’t realy recognized as a tree until 1976 when it rediscovered in a sense by two ecologists. It’s pretty cool to look at when you see in the Fall too, when its leaves change to a bright almost yellow-orange color.
